title: Really Riot? Thanks!
body:
Riot, what is this, where is Championship Jewels Shard Day 5, where!
Please Riot, tell me.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
If you're looking for a Championship Jewel Token, they're not available today. These tokens are only available during broadcast days of the Championship, so the next day these will be available is Thursday, the 6th. 

I definitely recommend checking out the FAQ that *Hyperion3182* linked, as it goes over the entire Worlds event. Let me know if you have any questions.

Open:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-

There is a calendar and everything is explained.
